name: Knight-Swift Transportation Holdings Inc.
description: Knight-Swift Transportation Holdings Inc. is one of North America's largest and most diversified freight transportation companies. Formed through the merger of Knight Transportation and Swift Transportation in 2017, the company operates a fleet of more than 20,000 trucks and provides a variety of logistics services across the continent. Knight-Swift's core business includes truckload, less-than-truckload (LTL), intermodal, and logistics solutions, enabling it to meet the diverse needs of its customers. The company prides itself on its commitment to safety, efficiency, and sustainability, utilizing advanced technology and data analytics to optimize its operations and enhance service delivery. Knight-Swift is dedicated to providing reliable transportation solutions while also focusing on reducing its carbon footprint through fuel-efficient practices and investments in alternative energy. With a robust presence in the market, Knight-Swift continues to expand its service offerings and geographic reach, positioning itself for future growth in the dynamic and competitive transportation industry.

seo.meta_title: Knight-Swift Transportation Holdings Inc. | Leading Freight Transportation Solutions
seo.meta_description: Discover Knight-Swift Transportation Holdings Inc., a top provider of freight transportation and logistics solutions in North America. Learn more about our services and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What services does Knight-Swift provide?
faq.answer: Knight-Swift provides truckload, less-than-truckload, intermodal, and logistics solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Knight-Swift?
faq.answer: David A. Jackson is the CEO of Knight-Swift Transportation Holdings Inc.

faq.question: Where is Knight-Swift headquartered?
faq.answer: Knight-Swift is headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona, USA.
